acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offence Act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Sahanur Ali  AKA Jahangir Ali is produced from jail hazot. Today is fixed for delivery of Judgment. Judgment written on separate sheets is delivered in the open court and enclosed with the case record. For the reasons recorded in the judgment, I have arrived at the finding that prosecution has succeeded to bring home the charge against accused Sahanur Ali U/S 10 of the POCSO Act, 2012 beyond all reasonable doubt and accordingly he is convicted under the section. The accused person is heard on the matter of sentence and same is recorded in a separate sheet in the form of question and answer and shall form a part of the record. Accordingly, accused Sahanur Ali AKA Jahangir Ali is sentenced to undergo Rigorous Imprisonment for 7 (Seven ) Years and also to pay fine of Rs. 5000/- (Rupees Five thousand only) in default R.I. of another 3 (three) months of the offence punishable under section U/S 10 of the POCSO Act. Period of detention already passed by the accused in jail custody will be set off U/S 428 of Cr. P.C. Issue Imprisonment Warrant. Furnish a free copy of the judgment to the accused person immediately. This Sessions Case is accordingly  disposed of.

Furnish a free copy of the judgment to the accused person immediately. This Sessions Case is accordingly  disposed of.

Accordingly, accused Sahanur Ali AKA Jahangir Ali is sentenced to undergo Rigorous Imprisonment for 7 (Seven ) Years and also to pay fine of Rs. 5000/- (Rupees Five thousand only) in default R.I. of another 3 (three) months of the offence punishable under section U/S 10 of the POCSO Act. Period of detention already passed by the accused in jail custody will be set off U/S 428 of Cr. P.C. Issue Imprisonment Warrant. Furnish a free copy of the judgment to the accused person immediately. This Sessions Case is accordingly  disposed of.
